markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs=""
>
[Armbands of Athleticism](/Equipment.aspx?ID=409)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 605 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armbands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Skilled awl work has imprinted images of a muscled weightlifter into these tiered leather bands, which grant you enhanced stamina and skill when performing athletic exercises. While fastened to your upper arms, the armbands give you a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks. In addition, whenever you use an action to Climb or Swim and you succeed at the Athletics check, add a +5-foot item bonus to the distance you move.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Armbands of Athleticism
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 605 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 645 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Armbands of Athleticism (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 605 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 13,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus to Athletics checks is +3, and the bonus to a successful check to Climb or Swim is +10 feet.
name: Armbands of Athleticism (Greater)
